name: Bruhvinadia
startIntroPart1: The Bruhmen have discovered land and decided to kick the bucket by making a Country. Luan Kabashi. May your reign belong and prospored.
startIntroPart2: It seems that the Government. Who basicaly decided for this. Mightjust be as strong as your stability. And it might exist for over years.
declaringWar: Why do you have to be like the dictator from the 2022 series Dröm om Demokrati.
attacked: Your Memes are not as good as mine.
introduction: Yooooo. I remember you. I.. Basically come in peace.
hateHello: What do you Dong up for!
afterPeace: Lets finnaly barter for Memes in our own Peace.
